description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to Healthcare Cybersecurity cryptographic development and implementation.
name: HITRUST CSF - Cryptography

values.description: Requirements on the use of cryptographic controls for information protection are formally developed and implemented.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Cryptography: 06.a Use of Cryptographic Controls

values.description: Requirements for the use, protection and lifetime of cryptographic keys is developed and implemented through their whole lifecycle.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Cryptography: 06.b Key Management
